Articles.Content:
Do you ever feel like you're watching a movie while playing KSP?
I sure am! All the time! And at one point I just had to realize but one of these KSP movies going on in my head.

So, Behold! - The mysterious journey towards the anomalous signal!
(heh, and can you guess all the space-movie-soundtracks I've used? )

Also - I regret not finding this particular forum earlier, but I'm glad to have found it!

creepy, but good.

amazing end, by the way...
